Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Camera Deal
Reviews.Author: Vicky L. Yates "kingskid17412"
Reviews.Content: Overall the price on this Camera Deal was by far the best.  My husband was so thrilled with the extras.  However the Camera Bag was CRAPPY.  Zipper broke as soon as I my husband unzipped it.  I was not pleased about that part.  It was shipped promptly and packed well,  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Ease of use.
Reviews.Author: William J Steffen
Reviews.Content: Loved it and am having the fun of my life. I have always loved Photography. Have had several camera's over the years and have taken thousands of pictures. I am looking forward to using this camera. It is something I have always dreamed of owning. Thank you so much for giving me the opportunity.

Reviews.Title: Perfect upgrade!
Reviews.Author: clundgren
Reviews.Content: I love it! My yearbook staff loves it. It was the upgrade we needed. The package was affordable for a small school district. It's easy to use and takes fantastic pictures.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 11 items, Camera & lens includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS APS-C Sensor DIGIC 4 Image Processor Full-HD Movie Mode Digital SLR Camera with 3.0-Inch Clear View Vari-Angle LCD (Body) - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - 12 Slot Foldable Memory Card Case
Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - SLR Camera Fast Access Carrying Case with Pockets & Neck Strap
UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filter - 5pc. Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + 9pc Bundle 16GB Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
